bill.summary:
Telecommunications Opportunities for Workers Engaging in Real Infrastructure Deployment Act of 2019 or the TOWER Infrastructure Deployment Act of 2019
This bill establishes the Telecommunications Workforce Development Advisory Council to (1) examine the needs of the telecommunications industry as it transitions to new technologies, and (2) generate recommendations to improve the industry's workforce development.
